from sys import stdin, stdout
from collections import defaultdict, Counter
import math
I = stdin.readline
P = stdout.write
t = int(I())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(I())
    a = [int(x) for x in I().split()]
    b = [int(x) for x in I().split()]
    x = a[-1]
    y = b[0]
    if x != y or b[-1] != 0 or a[0] != 0:
        print('No')
    else:
        flag = 0
        for i in range(1, n - 1):
            if a[i] + b[i] < x or abs(a[i] - b[i]) > x or a[i] <= 0 or (b[i] <= 0):
                flag = 1
                break
        if flag == 0:
            print('Yes')
        else:
            print('No')
